backstory.title: A Journey of Creativity & Adventure
backstory.description: Born with a creative soul and an adventurous heart, I've always found joy in exploring the world through both art and experience. Whether I'm sketching a new design, painting vibrant landscapes, or crafting delicate meringues, I bring the same passion and dedication to everything I create. My journey has taken me from quiet moments with a paintbrush to exciting adventures across new destinations, and through it all, I've learned that life's most beautiful moments are meant to be shared with the people we love.

memories.title: Adventure Awaits
memories.description: Embracing the thrill of new experiences and breathtaking landscapes. Every adventure teaches me something new about the world and myself, fueling my creativity and inspiring my next artistic creation.

memories.title: Sailing Away
memories.description: Finding peace and inspiration on the open waters. There's something magical about the ocean breeze and endless horizons that clears the mind and sparks imagination. These moments of tranquility are where some of my best ideas come to life.

memories.title: Cherished Moments
memories.description: Surrounded by the people who matter most. Family and friends are my greatest inspiration, reminding me why I do what I do. These precious moments together are the true masterpieces of life, more valuable than any artwork.

memories.title: In Front of the Lens
memories.description: Confidence, creativity, and storytelling through expression. Modeling feels like being the cover of a book without words—every pose, look, and movement tells a story. It’s where discipline meets art, and where I learn to own my presence and perspective.
